name: PARTHIAN STRIKE
description:
PARTHIAN STRIKE is a TPS robot piloting game.
It is designed to give players a sense of accomplishment in defeating powerful enemies while gaining a real feel for piloting a machine.



The goal of the game is to pilot a robot to attack and destroy enemy robots.
There are several types of missions besides defeating the enemy, such as stage traversal and defense, but the game is basically designed in a way that allows the player to focus on piloting and fighting in 1vs1 situations.
